# Slay Living (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Death Spells|death]]] \[[[Ectomancy Spells|ectomancy]]]

**Level:** [[5th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 10th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 10]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Touch

**Target:** Living creature touched

**Duration:** Instantaneous

**Saving Throw:** Fortitude partial

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 344

You can attempt to slay any one living creature. When you cast this spell, your hand seethes with eerie dark fire. You must succeed on a melee touch attack to touch the target. The target takes 12d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level. If the targetâ€™s Fortitude saving throw succeeds, it instead takes 3d6 points of damage + 1 point per caster level. The subject might die from damage even if it succeeds on its saving throw.
